Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Eidenhoft Boulevard, which runs diagonally through the town.
Room.LongDescription: To the south of Eidenhoft Boulevard is a large stable. You can see a number of horses running around with a few trainers. There is a building on the south side of the lot, off of Nagaritha Drive. On the north side of the road is the Shrine of the Protectors, a monument which is said to protect the town against invaders both by land and sea.
